description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the information disclosure vulnerability in the Windows Distributed File System (DFS) related to CVE-2024-26226:

1. Download and install the security update KB-5036896 from the Microsoft update catalog.
2. Restart the system to ensure that all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that could disclose sensitive information.
- For downloading, visit: https://www.catalog.update.microsoft.com/Home.aspx and search for KB-5036896.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is patched to the latest version.
- Backup any critical data before installing updates.
